item.title: We're Not A Console...Yet...
item.description: This week on Geeks in Progress: Batman fights Superman, rumors of Playstation 4.5 and Nintendo NX abound, Microsoft wants to cooperate on cross-platform play, The Division breaks sales records, and more!
